Package org.omancode.r.ui

R user interface elements including: A Swing console with a command history. A JTree representing objects in the R environment. A interface for UIs that gather input from the user and execute an R command.

See:
          Description

Interface Summary
RUICommand An R command generated from a set of GUI elements defined by a JavaBuilder YAML UI definition.
 

Class Summary
RObjectNode Tree node that represents an object in R.
RObjectTreeBuilder Builds a JTree that represents the objects in an R environment.
RSwingConsole Swing GUI Console with command history.
RSwingConsoleExample Simple example demonstrating the RSwingConsole.
RSwingConsoleExample.Person  
 

Package org.omancode.r.ui Description

R user interface elements including:

  • A Swing console with a command history.
  • A JTree representing objects in the R environment.
  • A interface for UIs that gather input from the user and execute an R command.

Author:
Oliver Mannion
